subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Chicago is the home of the United States Soccer Federation, but apparently not its kind of town when it comes to potential sites for the 2018 or the 2022 World Cup. San Francisco and the rest of Northern California are also on that list.
